item.title: How To use Jupyter Notebook As Hugo Blog Post
item.description: 1using Pkg 2using Distributions 3Pkg.add("Plots") 4using Plots 5x = range(0, 10, length=100) 6y = sin.(x) 7plot(x, y) [32m[1m Resolving[22m[39m package versions... [32m[1m No Changes[22m[39m to `~/.julia/environments/v1.8/Project.toml` [32m[1m No Changes[22m[39m to `~/.julia/environments/v1.8/Manifest.toml` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> 1!jupyter nbconvert --to markdown 2023-06-06-JuliaNotebook.ipynb syntax: extra token "nbconvert" after end of expression Stacktrace: [1] top-level scope @ ~/Dropbox (Politecnico di Torino Staff)/lavori/gitrepo/gianlucamastrantonio.github.io/notebooks/2023-06-06-JuliaNotebook.ipynb:1
